column1: Uchi////Our sushi chef prepared our rolls and when I asked for some wasabi to go along with them
column2: he recommended not using any with my rolls. Ok
column4: I trust him so I give it a try. The rolls were nothing special
column5: relatively bland and just sort of "meh" (would've been better with some wasabi). I can say that I enjoyed the duck liver
column6: but probably won't be back just for that. We had the fried milk for dessert which was pretty good
column7: it was very similar to gelato base or sweet milk with a crispy / lightly fried coating.
